original_text: He sends his lightning like an arrow. He commands it to hit the right place. He sends his lightning like an arrow. He commands it to hit the right place. He sends his lightning like an arrow. He commands it to hit the right place. He sends his lightning like an arrow.
korean_text: 그가 번갯불을 손바닥 안에 넣으시고 그가 번갯불을 명령하사 과녁을 치시도다

sentences.original_text: He sends his lightning like an arrow.
He commands it to hit the right place.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그것이 올바른 곳을 맞추도록 명령합니다.
